bios.text:
🇮🇳 Proud Indian Army
💪 Strength & Honor
🛡 Protecting my nation
🎖 Service above self

⚔ Army life chosen
🦅 Eyes always open
🏔 Mountains my home
💯 Dedicated to duty

🎖 Salute to soldiers
❤ Love for my country
🛡 Shield of the nation
🌄 Dawn to dusk service

🪖 Uniform is my pride
💪 Training is my life
🇮🇳 India is my soul
🎯 Mission is my goal

🔥 Fire in my heart
🛡 Shield in my hand
🇮🇳 India in my soul
🎖 Army is my life

⚔ Warrior by choice
🏔 Mountains my playground
🌅 Duty before dawn
🎖 Proud to serve
